name: smelling-salts
caption: Smelling Salts

effect.short: If the target is paralyzed, inflicts double damage and cures the paralysis.
effect.full: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  If the target is [paralyzed]{mechanic:paralyzed}, this move has double power, and the target is cured of its [paralysis]{mechanic:paralysis}.

flavorText:
This attack’s power is doubled when used on a
target with paralysis. This also cures the target’s
paralysis, however.
